 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַב‎</span>] **verb** ==burn, scorch== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒarâbu***</u></abbr>, ***burn***; [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>Za iii. 52</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>Es 32</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be kindled, blaze***;; compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זרב‎</span>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִצְרְבוּ‎</span>*** [[Ezek.21.3|Ezek 21:3]] all faces ***shall be scorched.***
